website_summaries.verdict: This is a great purchase for the customer who wants a faster dry, but needs lower heat.
pros: Far-infrared heat dries hair from the inside
Ionic construction improves moisture in the hair
Tourmaline adds shine and smooths hair while minimizing flyaways
cons: May not get hot enough to use for styling

customer_reviews.title: But this one is super light as well
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Solano. As with my other two, this dryer is powerful, dries my hair very quickly, smoothes all my frizz, and durable. But this one is super light as well. BTW, I bought my first Solano 7 years ago and it still works just fine. (I gave my second away to a friend after she tried using it and liked it so much.) I can't say enough good things about the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: B. Rolbiecki

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this blow dryer end of April 2017.. ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this blow dryer end of April 2017... it's just stopped working. I had read some reviews that stated this might happen but I ignored them. Lesson learned. Do not purchase this blow dryer would be my advise. Also the screen on back has already started to shred??odd right
customer_reviews.author: Gwolff

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy accessories and parts
customer_reviews.text: It's a good hairdryer. Performance is fine. But the accessories and parts are flimsy. I dropped the diffuser on a tile floor and it popped apart into a bunch of pieces that will not go back together no matter how hard I try. I'm now ordering a new diffuser for $22. Also, the threads on the removable filter cracked and I now have it duct-taped into place. Kind of ridiculous for a $200 hairdryer. If you buy this hair dryer, treat the removable parts with kid gloves.
customer_reviews.author: KVA

customer_reviews.title: SimplyThe Best!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Solano hairdryers for years in my hair salon, and there is nothing better out there. The 3500 Lite model is well balanced, powerful, and lasts for many years with continued daily use. The motors in these are high quality and made to last forever. I will personally never use any other brand, these are the gold standard in salon blow dryers!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lee MacInnis

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: (This is the wife reviewing under husband's account...) I have a ton of hair and it usually takes me forever to dry...and I wind up overheated and sweaty by the time I'm done. This drier first concerned me as it seems to blow less air/ volume than my old one. I am shocked to find after using it a few times that it actually dries my hair faster and does not make me as hot! I am a huge fan! Side benefit, it's also quieter than my old one. Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Blow dryer that is perfect in every way!
customer_reviews.text: I love this blow dryer! A friend recommended it to me because I needed a blow dryer that would dry my hair faster every morning and help me save time. I have thick hair and a lot of it, so drying it is a time consuming part of my getting ready routine. The Supersolano shaves several minutes off of my typical blow drying time, which I use to do other things, like styling, makeup, or picking out my clothes!!! Also, I love the long nozzle and slim design. It makes it easier to hang on my organizer in my bathroom along with my straightener and curler. It's the perfect addition to my daily beauty routine!!
customer_reviews.author: Young Choi

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: The blow dryer stopped working today. I have only had it for about 45 days. It can't handle being on the highest heat and the highest air setting at the same time. This product is not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: World Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hair dryer June 21st after one month it started smoking and isn't working!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer until it suddenly stops working
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed in this product😩Purchased it in July 2017 ( 2 months ago) & it just died (!) on Sept. 1 - no warning - just turned it on and NOTHING - tried reset button then every outlet in my house . Tried plugging in other products to make sure that wasn't the problem - would send it back but don't have packaging so I'm out $200!!!
customer_reviews.author: margaret hunt

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR MY HAIR TEXTURE!
customer_reviews.text: I have definitely struggled with finding a blow dryer that gives me that perfect light-fluff feeling. My hair is soft, but I still struggle with center thick, tight curly area of my hair that I couldn't seem to get as straight and fluffy as the rest of my hair. This blow dryer is stylish and I love that its light to handle, and it doesn't feel heavy to hold up. It blows my hair out so perfectly that I only have to put a little heat in my hair to get it straight. Future recommendation for manufactures would be to include an attachable comb. But other than that, GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Eron Bryant

customer_reviews.title: honestly one of he best hair driers I owned
customer_reviews.text: I have had the same product for over 7 years. honestly one of he best hair driers I owned. the old one still works! except the back fell so I thought its time for new one.
customer_reviews.author: Niloo B

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 2 mos until I used it for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this dryer on 12/10/17. Worked great for 2 mos until I used it for the first time in S Africa at a 5-star hotel. Plugged it into the wall via an adapter (also bought on Amazon). It instantly blew HOT air and within 10 seconds the dryer overheated and the motor began smoking. After cooling down it won't turn on. I used the same adapter and wall outlet for my curling iron, a cheap hotel blow dryer, camera, and cell phone chargers. No issues with anything working but the dryer. $200 down the drain!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... hair that takes forever to dry so I really love this dryer because it cuts the time it takes ...
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely thick hair that takes forever to dry so I really love this dryer because it cuts the time it takes by half. My stylist recommended this to me and it's the best I have ever owned. Be really careful not to drop it however as I did twice with my first one. It started smoking and I had to get a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Maria C.

customer_reviews.title: Great blower
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife. She spends like 2 hours in the bathroom getting ready to go places. Was looking for something to speed up the process and last longer than the 5 other dryers she's gone through over the years. It's not loud and dries her hair in record time and she's very happy with it. Doesn't get really hot from what she's told me and doesn't effect the quality of her hair in a bad way that is. I would recommend it to anyone that's willing to pay a little more for a good product which in the end saves you a lot of time.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Best dryer ever!
customer_reviews.text: Dang! Another great Solano purchase for me! Purchased my first Solano blow dryer 8 years ago and it finally started to die out. These dryers are truly amazing and last! Worth the cost for you treasured locks! This dryer is super lightweight with slow and fast speeds, also a cool shot if you use that feature. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: With only a life span of 5 months, this ...
customer_reviews.text: With only a life span of 5 months, this hair dryer is not worth what I paid for it. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought this to replace a Sedu
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a Sedu I had for 8 years or so. It feels solidly made although it's a little noisy. The output is much better than any hairdryer I've ever used. I have short, fine salt and pepper hair that looks frizzy and dried out when I don't use a tourmaline hair dryer. I use the no heat setting and my hair is dry in no time and looks great. It's much better than the Revlon tourmaline I bought at Target.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Top notch dryer, just not ideal for thin/fine hair.
customer_reviews.text: Truly a quality hair dryer, however it doesn't get as hot as I'd like. If you're looking for a hair dryer that will help add volume to fine and/or thin hair, this isn't the one for you. However, my wife has thick hair and loves it. The extra long power chord is a real plus for travelers (or at home) when you like the unfettered mobolity to dry your hair without being challenged by chord length. Again, high quality dryer, but I would only recommend for folks with medium to thick hair.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas D'Amario

customer_reviews.title: Salona is the absolute best hair dryer and works great on ant type of ...
customer_reviews.text: Salona is the absolute best hair dryer and works great on ant type of hair. This model is much lighter in weight compare to the original so makes it easier to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was awesome! I feel like this is not drying as ...
customer_reviews.text: I had the Solano 3200 for over 12 years. It was awesome! I feel like this is not drying as well as my old one, but it could be that this is ionic and light weight ??? If definitely sounds quieter than my old one, but I just loved that old thing that served my hair for over 12 years. :(
customer_reviews.author: Adrian A.

customer_reviews.title: This hairdryer was highly recommended by Consumer Reports and is a very quiet dryer
customer_reviews.text: my husband ordered this for me for Christmas. This hairdryer was highly recommended by Consumer Reports and is a very quiet dryer. Does an excellent job!
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: If you are going to invest in a hairdryer, this is the one.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this Solano hair dryer for over 30 year, I have only had to purchase 3 in in that time, great investment!
customer_reviews.author: MJR4

customer_reviews.title: love it, but..
customer_reviews.text: its a GREAT Dryer, when it works! Broke 3 times since June 2015. Frustrated. They repaired it each time, but third time I just got it back and broke in 1 day. Need same type of dryer, that works!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Dryer
customer_reviews.text: I own this blow dryer and every time my family comes to visit they go on and on about how much they love it. So, I decided to surprise my Mom with this dryer as a gift for her birthday. She and I both have a lot of hair and this Solano makes blow drying our thick hair a breeze. It puts off amazing heat and lowers our dry time immensely (takes about 5 minutes or so). If you're in the market for a blow dryer I highly recommend a Solano. Bonus points it's made in Italy!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Myers

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic blow dryer
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic blow dryer. My first blow dryer was a cheap hand me down from my mom that was pretty terrible. After a couple suggestions from barbers I went with this Supersolano and it has changed my hair game for life. My combover is now so much easier to shape since it has the diffuser which allows me to control the direction of the air pretty accurately. Cord is extremely long which helped when we went to Vegas and everyone was sharing my blow dryer. It's also much quieter than the old one which I like since I wake up before my gf. She loves this blow dryer too!
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: I had this Solano blow dryer for 20 years...it was heavier than the newer model but an excellent blow dryer. When it died, I purchased another Solano, which lasted 5 years. Considered purchasing another one, but price had doubled. Not worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Anya

customer_reviews.title: Half the weight of most hand held machines
customer_reviews.text: So light and easy to use compared to most. Many heat settings
customer_reviews.author: Deb E

customer_reviews.title: I think this could work well for some. My ...
customer_reviews.text: I think this could work well for some. My hair is very prone to static and this dryer gave me lots of it. I had to return the item.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Did EXTENSIVE review
customer_reviews.text: I have "just above the ear" length hair. I was using my travel hair dryer. I really did not think it mattered. My hairdresser mentioned that maybe I should consider a more powerful hairdryer. I came home ( looking well coiffed ) and began researching. After reading MANY reviews, I decided to purchase the Supersolano. It has been 2 months and my hairdresser was right. My hair dries faster and the drier is light with a very long cord.
customer_reviews.author: sqfromsc

customer_reviews.title: Much lighter than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Lighter weight than my other dryer! I just have to get used to the different buttons! They are rocker switches, which I really like.
customer_reviews.author: Bluemarlin15

customer_reviews.title: Broke after two weeks - defective product!
customer_reviews.text: This hairdryer just stopped working after two weeks of use, I bought it brand new. It looks like there are other reviews saying the same thing, there must be something defective with this product. This is unfortunate since my last dryer was a Solano and lasted nearly 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Love this dryer overall
customer_reviews.text: Love this dryer overall. I have hair down to shoulder blades that's straight with minimal waves. Hair is shiny and dries in less time. Wish there was another step between high and low, but still happy with it. I got a supersolano first, hated it, and am MUCH MORE pleased with this brand and model!
customer_reviews.author: jclife

customer_reviews.title: I've had it a little over a year and yesterday ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had it a little over a year and yesterday sparks flew out of the end while I was drying a guests hair at my salon. Then smoke came out of both ends. Being just over a year there's no warrenty. Won't buy Solano anymore. :(
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this hair dryer! I have used Conair for years and it would take at least 20 minutes to dry my thick hair (and it never really dried fully). This dryer COMPLETELY dries my hair within 10 minutes and leaves it so shiny and smooth! The high heat setting is perfect - it doesn't feel like it's burning my scalp; it's quiet and light... worth every dollar!
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda M.

customer_reviews.title: Performance it excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favor blow dryers I won’t get anything else. I used it everyday
customer_reviews.author: claudia contreras

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my wife. Great choice! Spend the money to get the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gary O.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I'm not one to usually spend significant amounts of money on beauty products. However, my hair has been dry and was sick of replacing $40 blow dryer's every few months. My sytlist recommended a Solano blow dryer. After a lot of research, I deceded on the 3500 lite. I love it! My hair loves it! It did not turn out frizzy or dry looking like it usually did. Plus, the motor is quiet and the heat is very even. Even on the highest setting, I did not feel like I was scorching myself. Can't beat the amazon/folica prices either!
customer_reviews.author: Duane Johnson

customer_reviews.title: slow flow
customer_reviews.text: thought this was going to be a lot stronger, the fan doesn't blow as hard of a flow as I was under the impression it was going to.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Sarraga

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: I had become tired of the anemic performance of the many hair dryers I've used over the years, and was looking for something more capable. My hairdresser uses a Supersolano 3500 1800 Watt Lite Professional Ceramic Toumaline Dryer, and recommended it to me. My daughter then let me try hers—and I was sold. It is quiet, powerful, and well made (in Italy). I've been using it for a couple of months, and am completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: MontBlancophile

customer_reviews.title: I am a hair stylist and I love this dryer so much I bought another for at ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a hair stylist and I love this dryer so much I bought another for at home. It dramatically reduces frizz and drying time but it also is not too hot- won't burn my clients' scalp or hair which is great! HIGHLY recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have used a Babyliss dryer for a few years now and when it blew out I decided to try this however upon arrival the dryer wouldn't start it did finally start up alittle but I'm returning I have read the motor can go rather quickly on this and for the price I didn't notice anyth great about this dryer. I would rather a reliable heavier D.C. Motor than a lighter AC motor that won't last. Really wanted to love this dryer but back it go's and purchasing another Babyliss as it had lasted alittle over 3yrs with out one problem. The cold button doesn't really work maybe this dryer is defected possibly?
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Dryer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair dryer! It doesn't get too hot, which is so much better for my fine hair. My older Super Solano has lasted about 20yeas with a couple of thermostat replacements--- however, it was heavy. As the years have gone by I now have arthritis in my left shoulder and the lighter weight dryer reallty helps. I don't notice much difference with ions and tourmaline (sp?) stuff, but the dryer is still great. And it's pretty quiet.
customer_reviews.author: mmwc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Light weight. Doesn't get too hot, but dries hair quicker than my old hair dryer!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Wyloge

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$$$
customer_reviews.text: Love my new hair dryer! It doesn’t leave my hair frizzy like my previous one did. Also found out that my hair stylist uses the same one!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Welter

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter as a birthday gift. She picked it out. This out of my area of expertise but she says its the best. That is good enough form. If she's happy, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Haynes Ford

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get as hot as expected
customer_reviews.text: Work in salon and bought this as it was the exact one another stylist had. Does NOT get as hot as hers. I kept it anyways as I was desperate for one to have at home.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hairdryer. I'm a repeat buyer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hairdryer. I'm a repeat buyer. I never not have one on hand in case my first hairdryer breaks. Follow me? ;)
customer_reviews.author: cotto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this hair dryer! Very powerful and lightweight with two blower attachments and heavy duty electrical cord.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not the best blow-drier out there
customer_reviews.text: This just broke & I haven't even had it 2 years. Really didn't blow hard enough in my opinion. The heat got hot for a few seconds then would turn off. Not the best blow-drier out there.
customer_reviews.author: Brittdo82

customer_reviews.title: best hairdryer i ever had
customer_reviews.text: best hairdryer i ever had, my hair is thick and course and this hairdryer dries it so fast, not hot just really powerful
customer_reviews.author: kim terlesky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Dryer, Longevity!
customer_reviews.text: Best hair dryer I have ever owned. Purchased this one 8 years ago and it is still going strong, despite daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Peas

customer_reviews.title: So so blow
customer_reviews.text: It was just as good as the 15 yr old one I was replacing. I thought there would be something special about it considering the high end price. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent product, good price
customer_reviews.text: very light, very strong, not too loud. this thing is the BOMB
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Regina

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Nice balance of air flow and heat. I have very thick, coarse, frizzy hair and this blow dryer dries fast and smooths hair without burning it.
customer_reviews.author: ShopperGirl

customer_reviews.title: I had read good reviews of this hair dryer on line and was ...
customer_reviews.text: I had read good reviews of this hair dryer on line and was excited to try it. Unfortunately, I found it to be underpowered and does get hot enough to straighten my hair. My hair is wavy, but not curly and have not had a problem with previous Baybliss hair dryer. Very disappointed with this product. Wish I had not given it a chance and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle C Pfaffenberger

customer_reviews.title: Great for home use.
customer_reviews.text: This dryer is exactly as described. I am using this dryer for home use and I am very happy with it. Nice heat. Not as high pitched as some dryers. Only thing I would like a smidge more is a cooler blast of cold air when you press the cold air button. But is it still very good!
customer_reviews.author: Shanon C.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: Very nice hair dryer, but kinda wish it had 3 speeds. It has low / high. Would like to see low / high / BLAST. Other than that, a nice dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer :)
customer_reviews.text: Great dryer, quick and little to no hair damaged. I have fine usually dry hair. Left it feeling silky soft and did not even look the slightest bit damaged or dry. Love this brand and products!!!
customer_reviews.author: CC Morales

customer_reviews.title: Super Supersolano
customer_reviews.text: Returned a heavier model for this one, & it's wonderful! So light & easy to manuever, still with fast drying & selection of temps. I find the cooler one's are better for the hair. Just wish it had 1 more speed,but still a great dryer. I have short, fine, thick hair and it has never looked so smooth with so little effort. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: ladyrunner

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic hair blower
customer_reviews.text: I tried this hair blower at the gym. I have thick curly hair in abundance. The Solano blower allows me to dry my hair and manage to make it softer looking in 25 mins. which for me is half the time it takes me with other brand blowers. It is worth every penny. I have been recommending it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Yeya

customer_reviews.title: ... have owned this brand previously and had years of good working
customer_reviews.text: Quality have owned this brand previously and had years of good working service
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You'll never buy another hairdryer- this is the best!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this hairdryer for three years now and it is the best! My stylist recommended it to me, and while it was a splurge- it was definitely worth it. The best part is that Solano will refurbish your dryer if it breaks or just isn't working as well as it used too. For the first two years it is free, and then after that you pay just $30. You will literally never need another hairdryer. I just sent mine in and it is as good as new! I recommend this to all my friends and have given as gifts to my mom and sister.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth R. Weathers

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent hair dryer.
customer_reviews.text: I can style my hair without drying it out. The attachments fit on this model.
customer_reviews.author: mjmay62

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME DRYER
customer_reviews.text: Best dryer ever! I always use this brand in my professional and home life. Very durable and has a long life.
customer_reviews.author: Syndy Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Warning! I purchased this blow dryer in mid-December (6-weeks ago).
customer_reviews.text: Warning! I purchased this blow dryer in mid-December (6-weeks ago). I couldn't figure out why the mesh filter at the end of the dryer kept ending up on the floor or in the drawer, but I finally figured it out. It appears that two of the three plastic "clips" that hold the filter in place have broken off. For the price I paid for this blow dryer, I would expect it to last for a very long time. Now the filter will not even stay on the dryer while in operation. I went back to Amazon to see how to return the blow dryer, by the Return Window closed on January 31st (FOUR DAYS AGO)! Wow. I'm beyond disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn S.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best dryer I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dryer I've ever owned. It dries my hair quickly without being so hot that it burns my hair. It was recommended to me by my hair stylist. I was previously using T3 Featherweight dryer and it fried my hair. I highly recommend this dryer to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Stange

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s light weight and dries fast I’m very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Laura W.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product does not heat up enough for me. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Rothman

customer_reviews.title: I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: It is as indicated - drys quickly and gets hot. I like it very much. It was expensive though, not sure I really needed to spend this much on a hairdryer, but now that I splurged, I am glad that I have it.
customer_reviews.author: mkf

customer_reviews.title: Makes blowdrying hair less of a chore
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my mom as a gift and she loved the lite-weight compared to her old dryer. Makes styling so much easier on her hands and her arms less tired! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Alaina

customer_reviews.title: I did like the hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: I did like the hair dryer, the one month that it lasted. It won't turn on, inspite of resetting the plug, which is not under warranty. Very expensive hair dryer to last only one month.
customer_reviews.author: lena coopamah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dries my thick hair very quickly and without making it frizzy. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: meg

customer_reviews.title: love..
customer_reviews.text: love...love this hair dryer! My CHI kept braking so my hair dresser recommended this one and I have been really happy with it! No issues!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah E Williams

customer_reviews.title: I Love!! this hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: This is the Second time I am writing a review. I dont usually do this stuff. I Love!! this hairdryer. I used to have frizzy and very dry hair after hair blowing my hairs. But I could see the difference by the 1st time I used this one. My hair was soft and silky. I could not even put my hair in the clips like before. They slide through the clips!! It is worth your money!! Made me feel very good about my hair after a long long time! :)
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: The best hair dryer I've ever had!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best! I bought the supersolano 3500 lite last year and fell in love with it the first time i used it! It dries my long hair in very little time and keeps it sleek and shiny, never frizzy. It is worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessa Cloud

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hairdryer. A few years old and still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Brady

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My hair seems to dry faster and I think it looks better than with my previous hair dryer, without being any where as hot. I feel like I discovered a secret to blow drying hair!
customer_reviews.author: Momof2

customer_reviews.title: My hair is fine and shoulder length and comes out with less flyaway ...
customer_reviews.text: First, I have only used this now for two days. But, immediately noticed how different my hair looked after drying. I am no expert with hair styling. Round brush around the face and then upside down. My hair is fine and shoulder length and comes out with less flyaway hair and a more styled look. The blowdryer that this one replaced was a T3 Tourmaline which I have been using for at least 4 or five years. I sure hope if anything this dryer has that kind of longevity. It had not stopped working, but, had been dropped on one too many occasions. They both have the same wattage.
customer_reviews.author: M. Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, lightweight and fast. Leaves hair smooth. Easy to clean. Heavyweight long cord. This is a professional dryer so the nozzle is longer than some.
customer_reviews.author: DCB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Blow dryer works good. Drys hair faster and not the normal frizz with other dryers.
customer_reviews.author: Charity Slusser

customer_reviews.title: Bad choice.
customer_reviews.text: This was a disappointment. We have used the lower wattage white lite supersolano dryers, which we were pleased with and thought we would up the wottage and go with this dryer. We were sadly disappointed in its performance. This dryer is supposed to be more powerful, but in our opinion, was the opposite. These dryers stink and did meet our expectations ever slightly. We wish we didn't throw away the boxes because they would of been sent back the same day. Boo.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon

customer_reviews.title: A MUST TRY FOR QUICK DRYING!
customer_reviews.text: Really recommend to speed up hair drying! Not to mention it is light weight and doesn't hurt my arm when drying! Great heat levels as well!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Makes all the difference from the cheap blowdryers I used to buy!
customer_reviews.author: christina m. french

customer_reviews.title: This is the best hair dryer I have owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the best hair dryer I have owned. It is the same model my hairdresser uses. Well worth the moeny
customer_reviews.author: J D

customer_reviews.title: Not buying again
customer_reviews.text: This sad dryer died after 2yrs of medium use. I expected a longer life for $135.00. Will not but again.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Best hair dryer I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: If you want to decrease the frizz on fine curly hair then I recommend this hair dryer. What a difference it makes just like other reviewers said. I bought two more for my daughters.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great dryer. Quite lightweight. Salon results at home. Stands up to its rating. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worth the investment. My hair is smoother, less dry and this dryer has definitely decreased my drying time!
customer_reviews.author: Jess Steele

customer_reviews.title: Dries hair super fast!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, if you have thick hair or hair that just holds a lot of water, this is the dryer for you. I have had this dryer for 2 years and just ordered one for my daughter. Her hair is longer and usually takes around 45 minutes to totally blow dry. With the Super Solano she can dry her hair in 10 to 15 minutes. It leaves my hair smooth and silky. I love this blow dryer and would recommend it to anyone. One note: it is a bit on the heavy side (not unmanageable at all) but if you are looking for a "lightweight" blow dryer, this is probably not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Mama D

customer_reviews.title: I like everything about the hair dryer except the very heavy ...
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about the hair dryer except the very heavy weight of the cord. It is much longer which is good, but the cord itself is heavier than necessary...
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Great blow dryer
customer_reviews.text: Works great and lasts a long time. Has a long cord too which I kind.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Love it Love it Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dryer I have ever used. It has much more power than the ones you buy at discount stores. Great for lifting your hair. I have thin hair and need body. This dryer is your answer.. Great product...
customer_reviews.author: doglover

customer_reviews.title: GREAT hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: GREAT hair dryer. My daughter recommend this one to me and it is the same one she uses at the salon. Another dryer I was using was actually frying my hair. Even burnt some of my bangs off. OMG ! This one is powerful, light weight and doesn't fry your hair. LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, it's not that hot but dry my hair so easily without burning... So lightweight, is very confortable...
customer_reviews.author: Mariely

customer_reviews.title: Not hot enough
customer_reviews.text: This is going back. This had a nice force and was very lightweight but did not get hot enought fo me at all. It was lukewarm warm at best. I also found the buttons to be poorly placed as I would accidentally push them when drying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer
customer_reviews.text: It is a great dryer, light weight. It dries my hair in about half the time as my old dryer.
customer_reviews.author: SandeeZ

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hair dryer. I have thin, damaged hair and this dries it quickly and leaves it looking nice.
customer_reviews.author: Dlr

customer_reviews.title: ... dryer can be so effective when it never gets super hot? it's more lukewarm - is that how ...
customer_reviews.text: i don't understand how this dryer can be so effective when it never gets super hot? it's more lukewarm - is that how it is supposed to work???
customer_reviews.author: Katie Rouff

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for a year then suddenly went dead. ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for a year then suddenly went dead. I expected more use of this product. I didn't save paper work, so I don't know about warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: not happy with this product super heavy and doesn't work well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Solano Supersolano 3500 Lite Professional Hair Dryer
product_meta.description: Italian-made 1800-watt professional dryer features a powerful but lightweight DC motor for less arm fatigue. Includes 2 concentrators. 3 temp settings and 2 speeds accommodate lots of styling needs. 2-year limited warranty. Ceramic distributes heat more evenly and ionic improves moisture in the hair while minimizing static electricity and removable filter
